directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
In a large saucepan, melt butter and add white wine.  Over medium heat, add shrimp and basil. Cook until pink all over; about 3 to 5 minutes. Serve over pasta.
ingredients: 2 pounds large shrimp, peeled and deveined
title: Quick Shrimp Scampi Pasta
